This folder contains the following third-party components used by ExifSpy:

- mphexeditor: https://github.com/michalgw/mphexeditor
  Author: author((C) markus stephany, vcl[at]mirkes[dot]de
  Lazarus port: Michal Gawitzky
  License: ?
  No need to install anything because the component code is directly available.

- mrumanager: 
  copied from Laz 2.1 (to avoid installing the package)

  
Used icons:

- Most of the used icons are provided by www.icons8.com 
  ("Simple small" icon set)
  
- The program icon is self-drawn using Inkscape.
